name: infinite 2d
description:
It is a Endless Runner where you have to jump over obstacles. You can also pickup anmo and coins. With the anmo you can destroy the obstacles and with the coins you can buy new cool looking skins.

Try to score your new highscore every time. 

There are also 4 different Bioms.(Earth, Gras, Dessert and blue-sky region).

PC: Jump - Space  or  W  or  UpArrow

       Shoot - left mouse click

      crouch - S  or  DownArrow

Mobile:

 jump - JumpButton

shoot - shootButton

crouch - crouch button
